content: “Open mind” 360: 2030 “Open source” & “Local support” The world has spoken and the deniers attempting to hold back change are going to be left out. This is out of need. The world is in motion. The transitions are being made. Keep up the good work. There is no real green or clean, but we are moving in the right direction. Let us keep building on what we started so many years ago. Do the math America stand up and be counted. Do not let this administration get in the way of our values. The kids are getting it right all over the world.
